TextView.android:text: 1.Usage Agreement: Users must agree to the terms and conditions before using the Safe Space application. By using the app, users agree to abide by the guidelines and rules outlined in the terms and conditions.
2. Safety Disclaimer: The application provides assistance and safety features but does not guarantee absolute safety. Users are responsible for their actions and decisions while using the app.

3. Data Collection and Privacy: The app may collect personal information for user identification and emergency response purposes. User data will be handled securely and in compliance with data protection regulations.

4.Emergency Response: Users understand that the app's emergency response features are dependent on network connectivity and may vary based on location and circumstances. The app is not a substitute for contacting emergency services directly in life-threatening situations.

5. Reporting Guidelines: Users are encouraged to report crimes and safety concerns accurately and responsibly. False reporting or misuse of the app for non-emergency purposes may result in account suspension.
6.Appropriate Use: The app is intended for legitimate safety and security purposes only. Users must not engage in any unlawful activities or misuse the app's features.

7. Liability: The app developers are not liable for any damages, losses, or consequences resulting from the use of the Safe Space application. Users agree to use the app at their own risk and discretion.

8. Updates and Modifications: The app developers reserve the right to update, modify, or discontinue features of the Safe Space application. Users will be notified of any significant changes to the app's functionality or terms of use.

9. Contact Information: Users can contact the app support team for assistance, feedback, or inquiries related to the Safe Space application. These terms and conditions aim to establish clear guidelines for users regarding the use of the Safe Space application, ensuring safety, privacy, and responsible usage of the app's features.
